extendedInfo.description: Catch most lively fishes in the sea, with a wide choice of fishing tackle. A dear diary is there to keep your daily fishing record. Start an exciting fishing trip now! # 9 cannons with different power and speed. # Throw a bomb to catch all fishes in the area.# Drop a piece of bread to bait all small fishes together.# Strike an electric shock to stun all fishes in the area.# Catch as many fishes as possible to power up your cannon into a laser firer.# Mermaids know where the sunken treasure is. Catch them to find out.# Bullhead sharks bring luck. Catch them to see how.# Fishes migrate in lines and crowds every once in a while. Don't miss out the chance for a good haul.# Reward shells every leveling up.# Hidden items in bonus stage.# Auto online/offline coin regenerate when you are lack of coins.Intuitive game rules:# Tap screen to catch fishes# Drag and drop an itemGood luck!==========================Droidhen is the name behind Defender, Defender II, Dinosaur War, Miracle City, Basketball Shot, DH Texas Poker, Gun of Glory, Shoot the Apple and many other top popular games. Droidhen is also marked as top developer by google.==========================

reviews.title: bye
reviews.comment: I love this game I play it on my moms phone  all the time and I enjoyed playing it..... I hope you like it tooooooooo. bye. bye
reviews.author: Hannah Danks

reviews.title: Aika
reviews.comment: I love it ! But i would give it 5 stars if there were more features.. Anyways, i enjoy playing it and its never boring.. Good game !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I wish that you could add some new aquatic animals like an eel,dolphin,clams,octopus, etc. And some crabs and catch-able chests and pearls from clams  and to be able to customize the sea\342\200\246other than that,this game is freakingly great!
reviews.author: diana marie padero

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: Its fun to play till you find out when you get the coins you need for power ups, it takes your coins and doesnt give you the power up.  Then wants even more coins for the same power up that you earned and didnt get.   You work hard to accumulate it again, thinking it was a fluke........ and the same things happens again.  It just seems they are determined to wring money out of you, and have no intention of giving you the rewards they said you would get from trying to play a good game.....
reviews.author: Karen K.

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Great game besides the fact all my progress was lost. However, I messaged them and they fixed it. Thank you. 5 out of 5 definitely should play
reviews.author: Maxwell Lai

reviews.title: Wth force close!!!
reviews.comment: This game is fun... Been playing this for long time... But now while im playing for less then 5 mins, it suddenly force close... I have tried few times... Pls fix the bug... :(
reviews.author: Winnie Fai

reviews.title: Updates!
reviews.comment: Wonderful game but needs updates since it gets boring over time. Why not add new fish or put an option that can allow us to catch rare fish that can become our pets on a fish tank where we can feed and care for them? Just a thought.
reviews.author: Alvin Tung

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good good good good
reviews.author: JingRui Yo

reviews.title: Ok-needs work
reviews.comment: Very unrewarding, but pretty, game. Too easy too run out of money, nets seem to have no logic, just chance (annoying). Don\'t waste shells on electro bolt. Needs to actually be able to earn coins for upgrades, too tedious. Sorry, been playing for a year and still can\'t upgrade cannon 8 our buy 9.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This game is borring.
reviews.comment: it takes your coins and doesnt give you the power up. it make me so borring, then i try to hack my coin, and i was successful, i upgraded my gun to max power and max speed, but i saw no different. so don\'t waste your time to play this game.
reviews.author: V\303\265 V\304\203n Trung

reviews.title: Lost all my coins and shells without playing
reviews.comment: So I had this game for quite awhile and I liked the game since its a great time killer.  BUT I lost 8000 over coins and 32 shells that I earned a few hours ago when I logged in earlier! What is wrong?!?!  Please return me the coins and shells if not im uninstalling this game -.-
reviews.author: Elano Elaine

reviews.title: Getting bore...
reviews.comment: Im now at level 104. Could you please add in something more interesting? Like fighting boss, more bonus etc...be creative so we can have more fun. Now i feels tedious...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S
reviews.comment: Very good game. However, it needs chance more than competance. You must catch mermaids and bull head shark to earn coins. But it still contain bugs so it tilts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: The worst game, it its chance not skill. Doesn\'t matter which net you use, it is still chance whether it catches anything. Just silly. Would be better if different nets were more useful for different fish, stop that there we done skill involved. Fix and I might come back
reviews.author: Stacey Bowers

reviews.title: Time waste
reviews.comment: Way too hard to earn money. You earn money by catching fish, but each shot costs you money, so you need to make sure your shots are profitable. you can rarely make a profit and when you do its only 1 or 2 coins, and upgrades cost 1000s. The upgrades don\'t seen to make a difference either. Has potential but too hard and monotonous.
reviews.author: John Sith

reviews.title: hard to catch
reviews.comment: At 1st i loved it, but after a while I realised even if I spent coin to power up the net only catches as and when it likes!! canon 1and canon 7 no diff, still hard to catch!? mermaids n sharks only can be caught by chance! so fast coins run out too... no shiok. going to uninstall after writing this comment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad game of alllllll time
reviews.comment: This game suck its way to hard for no reson. And you never have money to play the game.so who ever mad this you need to fix,it sucks balls

reviews.comment: it cool..can make my borikz gone...hahaha...keep it up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The game is good,but it lags and says better performance when online on my xperia x8..please fix the lag,its irritating,otherwise the game is awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is it every1 or just me?
reviews.comment: Hmmm... i got a feelin that everytime u upgrade ur weapon power, it become harder to catch fish even the small fishes! I can upfrade 3 lvl easily, now now m running out of money cuz fish are hard to catch!
reviews.author: Leangsing IV
